name: A Kenyan Safari
description: You begin as a tourist in the safari campsite.  There are 7 national parks to visit in Kenya, and 21 animals to see.  But to win the game, you really only need to find 5 of them.  The Big 5: lion, elephant, cape buffalo, rhino and leopard.  That's what you've come to Kenya to see.  Capture a photo of these 5 animals and you win the game.  Enjoy learning about Kenya's other famous animals along the way!
